description: Schema that describes a template element

$schema.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema '$schema' field in a template, element, and field

type.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'type' field in a template, element, and field

schema:identifier.description: Schema describing the template element's user-defined identifier

schema:name.description: Schema describing the template element name

schema:description.description: Schema describing the template element description

title.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'title' field in a template, element, and field

description.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'description' field in a template, element, and field

jsonLDValueFieldContent.description: Schema that describes the schema for a '@value' field

templateElementJSONLDContextFieldContent.description: Schema describing the schema of the '@context' field in a template element

templateElementPropertiesFieldContent.description: Schema that describes the schema of a 'properties' field in a template element

templateElementRequiredContent.description: Schema that describes the mandatory array items for the required field of a template element

templateRequiredFieldContent.description: Schema describing the schema of the 'required' field in a template

stringArray.description: Schema that describes the schema of a possibly-empty string array

propertyDescriptionContent.description: Schema that describes the schema of a property description in the _ui field in a template or element

userSpecifiedFields.description: Schema that describes user specified fields, which can be a template field, element, or a multiple fields or elements

stringAndNullTypeContent.description: Schema that describes the schema for an array containing strings 'string' and 'null'

type.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'type' field in a template, element, and field

schema:identifier.description: Schema describing the template element's user-defined identifier

multipleTemplateFieldsOrElements.description: Schema that describes a single data template field or element array
